article_title: Cardinal Dolan helps friends celebrate 40 years in priesthood

article_metadata.description: EAST LYME - Forty years ago, two men in their 20s stood before Pope Paul VI at St. Peter’s Basilica in Rome and chose to dedicate their lives to God.On Sunday, those two men reunited to celebrate their four decades in the priesthood.Monsignor Michael T. Donohue, 68, and The Most Rev. Michael T. Cote, bishop of Norwich, 65, shared their anniversary with the parishioners of St. Matthias Church in East Lyme on Sunday with His Eminence Cardinal Timothy Michael Dolan in attendance to
article_metadata.author: Jaclyn Diaz The Bulletin
